item.title: Galkons pimp armor
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“gs, post:2, topic:198706”]i know them all hold on
these are the ones from his server not on the item list
the item list is here - projectxzar.smfforfree4.com - under guides and downloads

[ul][li]DEMON AHRIMS
15217 15215 15216

Crowns
15086 15068 15069 15070 15071

QUEST ARMOR
15091 15092 15094 15093

PINK DRAGON
15109 15105 15107 15103

ORANGE DRAGON 15343 15338 15339 15340 15341 15337

all the BLACK T PLATES arms dont work

BLACK WHITE 7264 7263 7262 7265

BLACK RED 7254 7258 7257 7260

BLACK GREEN 7274 7273 7272 7275

BLACK BLUE 7269 7268 7267 7270

BLACK PURPLE 7279 7278 7277 7280[/li]
[li][/li][/ul][/quote]

… I asked for pimp armour not those stupid armours… I appreciate you trying to help but learn to read…

gs:

there is no command for pimp armor in his client.java

Don’t need a command I just want the item id’s then I’ll make a command but for now I need item ID"S!!!
